participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and enthusiastic with a love for fitness and food.
participant_1.background: I am a gym rat that loves to play racquetball. I love most music except country and jazz. My favorite tv shows are forensic files and jeopardy. My favorite book that I have read lately is Middlesex. My favorite food is anything Italian.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and determined, with a knack for cooking and a love for learning.
participant_2.background: I think I have talent for it. I did not pass the audition, but I will keep trying. I took classes while growing up. Since young I have loved to cook.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love to cook! I've been taking cooking classes since I was a kid.
That's awesome! I love cooking too. What's your favorite dish to make?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm a big fan of Italian food.
Me too! I love pasta. What's your favorite pasta dish to make?
I love making lasagna. I think it's the perfect comfort food.
Lasagna is so good! I love making it too.
Have you ever tried making it with ricotta cheese?
Yes! I love making it with ricotta cheese. It makes it so creamy.
I know, right? It's the best!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also love to watch TV. My favorite shows are Forensic Files and Jeopardy.
I love Forensic Files! That's a really good show.
I know, right? It's so interesting.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a gym rat! I love to work out.
That's cool! I'm not much of a gym rat myself, but I do like to play racquetball.
Racquetball is so much fun! I used to play it all the time when I was younger.
I know, right? It's a great workout.
So, what's your favorite book that you've read lately?
I recently read Middlesex by Jeffrey Eugenides. It was a really good book.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
So, what's your favorite food?
I love Italian food! My favorite dish is lasagna.
Me too! I love lasagna. It's so good.
So, what's your favorite music?
I like most music, but I especially like country and jazz.
I like country music, but I'm not really into jazz.
That's okay! We can still be friends.
